aboutMe: I am a person who enjoys exploring new places and walking by the high mountains near to Bogot√° city or just having an artisanal coffee with unique flavors. I consider myself a curious and adventurous person who enjoys travelling through new towns and capturing beautiful photos. My goal is to keep improving my working skills and travel around the world. funFacts: I'm counting the days for new gaming releases and tech innovations

quote.text: Don't waste time lamenting those moments that will never return.
